sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Menu, MenuItem, Grid, Card, CardContent, Drawer, IconButton, Avatar, Divider, Badge } from "@mui/material"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart"; import AccountCircleIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AccountCircle"; import HomeIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Home"; import ListAltIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ListAlt"; import ReportIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Report"; import AddShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AddShoppingCart"; import LocalMallIcon from "@mui/icons-material/LocalMall"; function UserDashboard() { // Menus state const [anchorElMasters, setAnchorElMasters] = useState(null); const [anchorElOrders, setAnchorElOrders] = useState(null); const [anchorElReports, setAnchorElReports] = useState(null); // Drawer state const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false); // Handlers for Menus const handleMenu = (setter) => (event) => setter(event.currentTarget); const handleMenuClose = (setter) => () => setter(null); return ( {/* App Bar */} Fuel4U Vehicle Master Product Master Place an Order My Cart My Orders Order History Wallet Reports {/* Icons section */} {/* Drawer/Profile Menu */} setDrawerOpen(false)}> jai devarajan {/* Dashboard Grid */} {/* Loyalty Card */} Available Loyalty Status Active ₹ 0 Available Loyalty - Blocked (In Cart, Payment Initiated) {/* Wallet Card */} My Wallet Limit Status Active ₹ 0 Amount available in your wallet {/* Orders Card */} My Last 5 Orders No records found {/* My Assets section */} My Assets No records found {/* Footer */} Home | About Us | Contact Us | Privacy Policy | Legal Notice | Cancellation and Refund Policy | Interested in Services | Become a Partner
© 2025 Reliance BP Mobility Limited. All rights reserved. ); } export default UserDashboard;
